org.spongepowered.api.text.sink

Interface MessageSinkFactory


  • public interface MessageSinkFactory
    Factory for MessageSink instances.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageSink combined(MessageSink... sinks)
      A message sink that targets all subjects contained within the given sinks and applies the message transformations of each sink in order (so with n sinks, sinks[n-1].transformMessage(sinks[n-2].transformMessage(sinks[...] .transformMessage(sinks[0].transformMessage(input)))) would occur)
      MessageSink to(Set<CommandSource> sources)
      Get a message sink that targets the given sources.
      MessageSink toAll()
      A message sink that targets all subjects currently active.
      MessageSink toPermission(String permission)
      A message sink that targets all subjects with the given permission.

    • Method Detail

      • toPermission

        MessageSink toPermission(String permission)
        A message sink that targets all subjects with the given permission.
        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to target
        Returns:
        The sink

      • toAll

        MessageSink toAll()
        A message sink that targets all subjects currently active.
        Returns:
        The sink

      • combined

        MessageSink combined(MessageSink... sinks)
        A message sink that targets all subjects contained within the given sinks and applies the message transformations of each sink in order (so with n sinks, sinks[n-1].transformMessage(sinks[n-2].transformMessage(sinks[...] .transformMessage(sinks[0].transformMessage(input)))) would occur)
        Parameters:
        sinks - The sinks to combine
        Returns:
        The sink

      • to

        MessageSink to(Set<CommandSource> sources)
        Get a message sink that targets the given sources.
        Parameters:
        sources - The sources to have as recipients
        Returns:
        The sink
